name: Anthill (itch) (Frovens)
description:
Do you like games like "Snake" ?

This is a little game, that I have created to train myself.  He's very addictive, I'll explain you why :

  1. You must use your reflex to dodge the others "Ants"
  2. You must be strategic to predict their paterns.
  3. You will want to have the best score ever by collecting the plants.

You're now warned.
